course: Data Structures, Algorithms, and Discrete Mathematics I (C++)
Data Structures, Algorithms, and Discrete Mathematics II (C++)

job.name: University of Washington
job.title: Undergraduate Reserach Assistant
job.description: Work on creation of a functional API for a tower defense game, Hug the Line, to use in teaching beginner-level coding concepts. In addition, write and refine lesson plan materials to support over 30 hours of instruction to teach java programming using the functional API to middle school aged students.

job.name: University of Washington
job.title: Undergraduate Reserach Assistant
job.description: Reserach and study the efficient strategy in finding protein network motifs, and as well implement a network motif detection software using c++ and python integrating with SQL. Detection of network motifs is computationally expensive, and speeding up the process using database engines will improve its usability in biology.

job.name: University of Washington
job.title: Undergraduate Reserach Assistant
job.description: Work with a research group that focuses Mobile Health Application to develop an iPhone health application that analyzes users’ stress level. Research and study best practices with Objective-C, the security aspect of mobile application, and also the UX/UI design for health application smartphone and PDAs.

job.name: North Seattle
job.title: Computer Science and Mathematics Tutor
job.description: Assist students 1:1 with concepts and assignment according to individual strengths, and as well offer assistance with developing study strategies and techniques. Lastly, represent the institution in collaborating with e-tutoring, online tutoring platform.

job.name: University of Washington
job.title: Teaching Assistant
job.description: Performed duties and tasks that are instructed by the Professor. Mainly, responsibled in evaluating and grade assignments, quizzes, examinations, and record grades. But, also assisted the Professor in designing the course, preparing materials for the class, and also observing the class’s understanding of the course material according to their performance in the assignments.

job.name: Papaya Clothing
job.title: Sale Associate
job.description: Assisted customers with questions and concerns about products. Handled sales transactions courteously and professionally, including operating cash registers and handling all exchanges and returns. Sustained a neat, clean, organized, safe, and friendly shopping environment. Supervised and trained new employees

job.name: MBK Center
job.title: Event Staff
job.description: Utilized a thorough knowledge of building policies, procedures and event requirements. Provided access control, crowd management and ensure the venue is safe for guests. Provided guests with accurate event and venue information. Acted upon all comments/complaints in a prompt and friendly manner. Ensured a safe and fun environment for all guests, staff and performers. Assisted in other duties as assigned

work.name: Farm House
work.description: is a 3D world and simulation that I and a few friends created for a bit of fun. The theme was a modern house in a farmland, inspired by 雲海に浮かぶ箱舟. I was responsible for 3D modeling the house, animating and creating features of the house, and as well implementing gaming control.

work.name: UW IAS
work.description: is an iPhone health application that analyzes users’ stress level. Worked with a research team that focuses on Mobile Health Application. I was responsible for studying UX/UI UX/UI for health application smartphone and PDAs, and as well implementing the interface for the application.

work.name: BigTree Resort Official Website
work.description: is an official website for BigTree Resort, which is owned by my family in Kamphaeng Phet, Thailand. I alone designed and implemented the site to display all important necessary information about the resort and as well online room reservation service that send reservation information directly to the hotel receptionist through e-mail.

work.name: HPBE+
work.description: is a fan forum dedicated Hello! Project members, but not limited to other Japanese bands and groups in any music genre. It is a place for fans to share news and talk about their favorite idols. I was one of the administrators who responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the interface of the forum.

about.head: I'm a Software Developer from Seattle, WA, with a passion for design.
about.description: I am passionate in developing softwares or tools that make lives of others better and giving them a deeper connection to technology. When I am not coding, I love to ice skate and eat a lot of chocolate ♥
